tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE plastic_manufacturing_companies (
   id INT,
   company_name VARCHAR(255),
   location VARCHAR(255),
   employee_count INT,
   waste_management_practices TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_management_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    waste_generated FLOAT,
    waste_disposed FLOAT,
    waste_recycled FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES plastic_manufacturing_companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE plastic_companies (
 company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 company_name VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 waste_management_practices TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_management_logs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 company_id INT,
 log_date DATE,
 waste_type VARCHAR(255),
 waste_quantity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE company_contacts (
 contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 company_id INT,
 contact_name VARCHAR(255),
 contact_email VARCHAR(255),
 contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_bins (
    bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bin_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    bin_capacity INT NOT NULL,
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES plastic_companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    collected_waste_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    bin_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (bin_id) REFERENCES waste_bins(bin_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal (
    disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disposal_date DATE NOT NULL,
    disposal_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    disposal_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    collection_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES waste_collection(collection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Waste_Management (
    waste_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    waste_type VARCHAR(50),
    disposal_method VARCHAR(50),
    amount_collected DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Waste_Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    waste_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT
);
